name: Mythical Mayhem
description:
Mythical Mayhem is a fantasy deck building game. It is currently playable with a couple of scenarios and the ability to create a custom game with all currently released decks. As new elements are released players with early access will have the opportunity to use this content and provide feedback.

Early Access Version 0.1.1 Features

  • Fantasy strategy deck building game
  • Recruit Heroes
  • Defeat Foe's and Arch Villains in combat that has a random element
  • Single Player
  • Custom game allowing you to choose your decks
  • Realm Balance
  • Many different ways to play

Early Access Version 0.1.1.3 Decks

  • 7 Generic Unnamed Hero Decks
  • 2 Named Hero Decks
  • 3 Side Quest Card
  • 3 Quest Cards
  • 7 Gear Cards
  • 3 Relic Cards
  • 3 Dark Sagas
  • 8 Dark Sagas Chapter Card Variations
  • 4 Arch Villain Decks
  • 8 Arch Villain Ambition Card Variations
  • 5 Foe Decks
  • 4 Minion Decks
  • 4 Scenarios
  • 5 Benefactor Cards
  • Custom Game Creator
